title: Mag!c Esports - Slots Available

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Mag!c Esports (@MagicEsportsGG). Organization looking to become bigger | CS:GO | Rocket League | League of Legends | Overwatch | #Leviosaah | Sponsor: @EsportsDesignGG

body:
http://i.imgur.com/ycsVJF9.png[/img]

Are you in Gold or up and looking for a competitive team? Than Mag!c Esports may be the team for you. We are looking to fill out our roster which requires the following roles:

-Top
-Mid
-Jungle

If you are one of these roles and fit the appropriate ranking then this team may be for you! Currently we have no requirements about role playstyles but as the team starts to come together we will build around it more. (IE a person plays more carry top laners, we will want to then focus on a more supportive type of mid laner who can play zilean, lulu, etc.) 

We prefer you to be 16 years or older for maturity reasons. No flaming, no toxicity needed. We are willing to work with you to help you to improve yourself both as a player and a teammate. We have a manager who is willing to review games and scrim with us to help us improve and allows him to give us personalized advice.

If you don't want to add us in game then please comment with the following info:

IGN:
Role:
Rank:
Rank Last Season:
Playstyle:
Top 3 Champs For Your Role:
Strengths:
Weaknesses:

Otherwise feel free to send us a message in game:

{{champion:412}} 
IGN: Sturdy Ghost
Role: Support

{{champion:222}} 
IGN: Cheezit Jesus
Role: ADC

{{champion:25}} 
IGN: Prior of the Ori
Role: Mid

{{champion:68}} 
IGN: Draxgun
Role: Top

{{champion:79}} 
IGN: Solarica
Role: Jungle

replies.body:
IGN: god of tea
Role: mid
Rank: p2
Rank Last Season:d4
Playstyle:depends on champions but excel on both supportive and aggressive champions/matchups
Top 3 Champs For Your Role: viktor, taliyah, ahri
Strengths: Can learn new champions easily, shotcall well, decision making is 9/10, open to critism 
Weaknesses: Some matchups I can struggle a lot, expect more out of my team than they can actually accomplish at times.

IGN: LittleBlueOne
Role: Jungle
Rank: Gold 5
Rank Last Season: Plat 5
Playstyle: whatever fits the moment
Top 3 Champs For Your Role: Eve, Ivern, Vi
Strengths: Game knowledge 
Weaknesses: Greed

> [{quoted}](name=LittleBlueOne,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=FlNBxGLW,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-30T18:28:01.228+0000)
>
> IGN: LittleBlueOne
> Role: Jungle
> Rank: Gold 5
> Rank Last Season: Plat 5
> Playstyle: whatever fits the moment
> Top 3 Champs For Your Role: Eve, Ivern, Vi
> Strengths: Game knowledge 
> Weaknesses: Greed

Sent you a request in game, have a few questions for you and then we can setup a time for you to try out.

We have filled the slots of our Primary team, we are still looking for slots for a secondary fill in team. This team will still practice as a 5 man and scrim and review each week just like the primary; however, when event time comes around if one of the primaries is unable to make it we are turning to whoever is in that slot on the secondary to fill in for them during that event. 

The positions we need still for the secondary are:

Jungle
Support
ADC

if you are interested please let me know.

IGN: Unpureruination
Role: Top
Rank: Plat 1
Rank last season: Almost diamond 3, but the 3/13 gp had other plans lol, so stayed at d4
Playstyle: Playmaker
Top 3 Champs for your role: Poppy, Darius, Akali indeed Akali
Strengths: Learns mistakes and goes back to see what i can do better
Weaknesses: Greed at times

IGN: Destíny
Role: Top
Rank: Silver 1
Rank Last Season: Gold 2
Playstyle: Aggressive
Top 3 Champs For Your Role: Riven, Jayce, Poppy
Strengths: Split pushing, vision control around top side, great decision making.
Weaknesses: Getting Camped

IGN:Draxgun
Role: Top
Rank: g2
Rank Last Season: p5
Playstyle: Passive laner , farm lanet
Top 3 Champs For Your Role: Poppy,Naut, Fiora
Strengths: Map control, map awarenness , meta fit, easy to work with

Weaknesses: Struggles to communicate

IGN: Repose
Role: Jungler
Rank: Gold 1 promos 2-2
Rank Last Season: P2 last season but decayed to p3 lol
Playstyle: Depends on champion, but usually I play safer in the early game
Top 3 Champs For Your Role: Nautilus, Elise, Hecarim
Strengths: I can play anything honestly
Weaknesses: Can get too aggressive, underestimate enemy

Sent you a request in game so I can ask you a few more questions and can set up a tryout time with you.

IGN: Lv 1 Articuno
Role: Top/Mid
Rank: S2
Rank Last Season: G5
Playstyle: Passive
Top 3 Champs For Your Role: Shen, Irelia, Naut
Strengths: Passive. wait for enemies mistakes
Weaknesses: Not good at being aggressive

> [{quoted}](name=Daniel Michael,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=FlNBxGLW,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-30T17:52:41.293+0000)
>
> IGN: Daniel Michael
> Role: Top
> Rank: Gold 2 
> Rank Last Season: Platinum 3
> Playstyle: depends, but usually pushing lane or playing very passive 
> Top 3 Champs For Your Role: Fizz, Lulu , Jax
> Strengths: Dedicated, attends every event/practice, listens to every critique, plays a-lot of games daily.
> Weaknesses: I have bad games lately in solo q.


I've sent you a request in game. We can work out a time for you to tryout, hopefully today if possible.
Played with and added you to the team. That leaves a Top and Jungler still open.

IGN: Prior of the Ori

Role: Main Mid (Can play anything)

Rank: Last 3 seasons I was between S3-S1. (I mostly played alone so never took it to seriously but I have 5 years of experience)

Playstyle: I can adapt to any play style easily, I usually tend to be more passive but that's because I have been alone.

Top 3 champs: Morgana, Lux, Veigar. (Or any mage type)

Strengths: Incredible communication, map awareness, warding, and roaming.

Weaknesses: I have little team experience compared to my total play time, I ran a team for 2 months with schedules training times and did shot calling but every ones time zones were way off and we couldn't keep it together. On rare occasions during team fights with way more actions taking place then usual I get a little confused, so I mostly play champs like Morgana for good AoE engage so I don't have to focus to much. I just need more practice with a good team for that. 

I am free almost every day in the afternoon past 1:30pm (Central Time) till about 8:30ish. I am a 26yr old stay at home father of 3.
